replies.body:
I wonder If you can obtain a Gemstone from these...
Literally nobody knows
The reason for this is because, unlike a chest where you get just one, you get three "chances" for a gemstone or Mythic skin permanent.  It does the check three times, in other words.

> [{quoted}](name=Larriet,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=cmE9juQ9,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-01-14T00:06:30.598+0000)
>
> The reason for this is because, unlike a chest where you get just one, you get three "chances" for a gemstone or Mythic skin permanent.  It does the check three times, in other words.

That's what I assumed, but it's still an extremely terrible (and hilarious) way to word it lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Guiboulou,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=cmE9juQ9,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-01-14T02:59:23.119+0000)
>
> That's what I assumed, but it's still an extremely terrible (and hilarious) way to word it lol.

I figured it was auto-generated LOL

> [{quoted}](name=Larriet,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=cmE9juQ9,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-01-14T03:10:19.462+0000)
>
> I figured it was auto-generated LOL

Hopefully, but even then... they probably should've coded that differently haha

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=cmE9juQ9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-13T22:31:01.776+0000)
>
> {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I went to buy a Blood Moon Capsule because I have a gambling problem and then I saw this in the item description lol.
They are truly, truly, truly outrageous.

G E M S T O N E

S K I N
